name: Fidelity Mortgage Guarantee Co. v. Bobb et ux. (Rosenthal's Appeal)
name_abbreviation: Fidelity Mortgage Guarantee Co. v. Bobb

parties: Fidelity Mortgage Guarantee Co. v. Bobb et ux. (Rosenthal’s Appeal).

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Maxey,
The opinion and order filed in the case of the Fidelity Mortgage Guarantee Company, Appellant, v. Joseph Bobb and Annie Bobb, indexed to No. 311, January Term, 1931, covers all questions in this appeal indexed to No. 314, January Term, 1931, and the order in that case applies to this case also.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Maxey,

casebody.head_matter:
Fidelity Mortgage Guarantee Co. v. Bobb et ux. (Rosenthal’s Appeal).
March. 14, 1932:
